I already said they ran out because they were fighting at night, but 
probably had some power charged up in the weapons to let them fight a 
short time.  What makes you think the gun he was using wasn't an 
energy weapon anyway?  And finally these people are actually military 
NOT AN EXPLORATION VESSEL, AND SOME RANDOM STOLEN SHIP!  They will 
probably have the better weapons that can hold more power or ammo.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Whee... time to kill two birds with one stone. Dinobot wasn't using 
his 
> energy weapons during coming of the fuzors instead he was using a 
hand 
> blaster and a shotgun laser blaster type thing. Because of this he 
ran out of 
> ammo. Also the weapons couldnt be solar charged because then they 
would have 
> to be outraegeously used to charge and power the weapon. And if 
there were 
> solar cells then there would have been power to power the weapons 
at night 
> since what kind of idiot wouldn't have solar batteries that took in 
some of 
> the energy to operate the weapon at night. This still doesn't 
explain why 
> they faught at night either. Face it they needed ammo and they did 
run out of 
> it at times and in G1 they also ran out. Don't deny simple facts 
such as

post at an 
> enemy.
